name: Dav Guy Girardeau
description: I’m a very affectionate, loving and caring person and enjoy the return. I am very romantic, passionate and full of sweet surprises,I love to have fun, which could mean a lot of different things. I enjoy a laid back evening at home cooking together then cuddling up to watch a good movie. Or a party with lots of friends, a game, a concert, a day out on the water or an evening walk on the beach. I am a happy person and I like being around people that enjoy life. Life is too short to not enjoy every moment we have. I love kids and animals. I am a big kid! I love many different kinds of music. I am a bit artistic and that side of me comes out in a lot of the things I do. I love weekend drives to just about anywhere to see new things. I am a happy person and I want to be with someone that really enjoys life. I need a nice and romantic woman with good heart of love to love and be loved. Woman who has experience in relationship, matured in her ways. Woman who will accept my only daughter like her own just like i will treat hers. Woman who understand what love is all about, to join help build up a family. I like to live and share my life with a special person, going places and doing things that are fun with her. I have a lovely look and qualities that I have to give to the woman of my Dreams
